dmca.title: DMCA notice to Google, Inc.
dmca.body:
Alter Communications, Inc.
Publisher of Baltimore Jewish Times, Style and Chesapeake Life

April 17, 2007

Google, Inc.
Attn: Blogger Legal Support, DMCA Complaints
1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy
Mountain View, CA 94043

VIA FACSIMILE

To Whom It May Concern:

I am writing regarding in what we view is a copyright infringement by one of your blog site. http://www.jewishsurvivors.blogspot.com and their Friday, April 13, 2007 posting "The Story of Rabbi Ephraim Shapiro.Rabbi's Abuse Victims Suffer Years Later."

Our publication, the Baltimore Jewish Times owns that material and that of our website jewishtimes.com, specifically: http://www.jewishtimes.com/3126.stm

I have a good faith belief that use of the copyrighted materials described above on the allegedly infringing web pages is not authorized by the copyright owner, its agent, or the law.

I swear, under penalty of perjury, that the information in the notification is accurate and that I am the copyright owner or am authorized to act on behalf of the owner of an exclusive right that is allegedly infringed.

Sincerely,

Andrew A. Buerger
Publisher,
Baltimore Jewish Times

The writer's email address is: abuerger@AlterYourView.com

1040 Park Avenue Suite 200 Baltimore, NC 21201
Jewish Times 410-752-3504 Style 410-332-1951 Chesapeake Life 443-451-6023
